description: DNA construct used for modification or treatment
title: Construct

___name.description: Short name for construct - letters, numbers, hyphens or underscores allowed (no spaces)
___name.title: Name

___description.description: A plain text description of the construct.
___description.title: Description

___url.description: An external resource with additional information about the construct.
___url.title: URL

___vector_backbone.description: The vector backbone for this construct
___vector_backbone.title: Vector Backbone

___designed_to_target.description: The gene or genomic region that this construct is designed to target
___designed_to_target.title: Designed to Target

___expression_products.description: Proteins or transcripts the construct expresses, including modifications
___expression_products.title: Expression Products

items.description: String describing fusion protein or other tag the construct contains.
items.title: Fusion Tag

___construct_vendor.description: The Lab or Vendor that provided the construct.
___construct_vendor.title: Construct Vendor
